title: Songs to remember
brief_description: A collection of late 1940s songs with nostalgic visuals of the “good old times” and big band music. Songs include ‘Take me out to the ballgame’ (Men and Maids of Melody), ‘The sidewalks of New York’ (Michael Bartlett) and ‘In the good old summertime’ (Men and Maids of Melody).
description: A collection of late 1940s songs with nostalgic visuals of the “good old times” and big band music. Songs include ‘Take me out to the ballgame’ (Men and Maids of Melody), ‘The sidewalks of New York’ (Michael Bartlett) and ‘In the good old summertime’ (Men and Maids of Melody).
description_for_label: A collection of late 1940s songs with nostalgic visuals of the “good old times” and big band music. Songs include ‘Take me out to the ballgame’ (Men and Maids of Melody), ‘The sidewalks of New York’ (Michael Bartlett) and ‘In the good old summertime’ (Men and Maids of Melody).
